import React from 'react'; import './FeaturedActivities.css'; const FeaturedActivities = () => { const activities = [ { id: 1, title: '赤州中心', location: '市中心竞技场', date: '5月6日', time: '14:10-16:00', price: '$120', participants: 8, maxParticipants: 12, image: '/assets/images/activity-1.jpg', difficulty: '中级' }, { id: 2, title: '大巴家', location: '户外训练场', date: '5月7日', time: '10:00-12:00', price: '$90', participants: 5, maxParticipants: 10, image: '/assets/images/activity-2.jpg', difficulty: '初级' }, { id: 3, title: '王明伟', location: '科技园区', date: '5月8日', time: '19:00-21:00', price: '$150', participants: 12, maxParticipants: 15, image: '/assets/images/activity-3.jpg', difficulty: '高级' }, { id: 4, title: '夜战模式', location: '地下竞技场', date: '5月9日', time: '20:00-22:00', price: '$180', participants: 6, maxParticipants: 8, image: '/assets/images/activity-4.jpg', difficulty: '高级' } ]; return (

精选活动

{activities.map((activity) => (
{activity.difficulty}

{activity.title}

{activity.location}

{activity.date} {activity.time}
{activity.participants}/{activity.maxParticipants}人
{activity.price}
))}
); }; export default FeaturedActivities;
